subject: p13135946
History: Status post CABG and MVR. Comparison is made with prior study. There has been increase in moderate right pleural effusion. If any there is a small left pleural effusion. There is mild stable vascular congestion. Cardiomediastinal contours are unchanged. Swan-Ganz catheter tip is in the main pulmonary artery. There is no evident pneumothorax. Left chest tube remains in unchanged position. Sternal wires are in unchanged position.
Impression: Increase in moderate right pleural effusion.
